effect: Enemies have less health, but enemy damage is increased!
name: Abhorrent Cologne

effect: A percentage of damage taken charges your signature arcana!
name: Absorption Coil

effect: Increases ferocity of your burn status effects!
name: Agni's Sparkler

effect: Receive signature charge when healed!
name: Albert's Formula

effect: All Chaos Gems gained during the Chaos Trials are transmuted into gold!
name: Alchemist's Stone

effect: Increases all damage dealt!
name: Amulet of Sundering

effect: Increases critical hit chance!
name: Analytical Monocle

effect: Damage and stuns are increased but movement speed is reduced for each cursed relic owned!
name: Anchor of Burden

effect: Your charged signature arcana deals more damage every time you use it!
name: Ancient Fountain Pen

effect: Adds a small chance to evade attacks!
name: Antiquated Tabi

effect: All gold costs for arcana are discounted!
name: Arcana Rewards Card

effect: Grants a significant boost in armor! Every hit taken reduces gold count.
name: Armor of Greed

effect: Increases armor while at low health!
name: Armor of Resolve

effect: Increases critical hit damage!
name: Assassin's Blade

effect: Increases critical hit chance at low health!
name: Auditor's Talisman

effect: Increases resistance to earth based attacks!
name: Auger of Poetry

effect: Damage and movement speed is increased while signature arcana is charged!
name: Autograph Pad

effect: Increases lightning damage!
name: Battery of Taranis

effect: Increases damage dealt for a short while after taking damage!
name: Berserker's Axe

effect: Damage increased while at low health!
name: Berserker's Helm

effect: Destroying an enemy projectile grants signature charge energy!
name: Bladed Buckler

effect: Summons a sprite that slows enemies!
name: Blasting Sprite Aura

effect: Defeating enemies grants a chance to temporarily add unlimited charges to your movement arcana!
name: Boots of Frenzy

effect: Pressing forward into an attack immediately before impact allows you to guard the attack!
name: Bracers of the Beast

effect: Enemy max health is lowered, but your health is lowered as well!
name: Broken Plague Flask

effect: Gets heavier as you progress through the trials. Drop from inventory to open.
name: C-99 Piggy Bank

effect: Increases armor for a short duration after taking damage!
name: Calcifying Bonemail

effect: Adds a chance to evade while at low health!
name: Calvin's Sandy Shoes

effect: Equipping arcana of differing elements increases damage!
name: Captain's Ring

effect: Increases damage based on how much of the map you have revealed! Damage increase lasts for the entire trial!
name: Cartographer's Quill

effect: Reveals health bars for all enemies in the Chaos Trials!
name: Chaos Scanner

effect: Adds a chance to charm enemies when taking damage!
name: Charming Teddy Bear

effect: Summons an aura that damages nearby enemies!
name: Cobalt Firestone

effect: Basic arcana have an extra combo!
name: Combo Gloves

effect: All Rogues and Archers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.
name: Conqueror's Belt

effect: All Mages and Summoners have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.
name: Conqueror's Cloak

effect: All Knights and Lancers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.
name: Conqueror's Helmet

effect: After evading an attack, all of your attacks will be critical hits for a short duration!
name: Covert Ops Mask

effect: Critical hit chance is increased for you and all enemies!
name: Crimson Clover

effect: Makes you believe all your attacks result in critical hits!
name: Critical Placebos

effect: Damage taken is expended from your signature meter while you have sufficient charge to shield the attack!
name: Cushioned Flip-flops

effect: Increases damage based on how much gold you currently have!
name: Dagger of Midas

effect: Designed by Artisan Mathosse Feadur, this relic triples the critical hit chance for all melee arcana!
name: Dark Katana

effect: Enemy projectiles move slower, giving you more time to react!
name: Dated Sunglasses

effect: Destroys all projectiles in the area when hit by a projectile!
name: Deafening Cymbals

effect: Increases the duration of buff arcana!
name: Demi's Teapot

effect: Defeating foes lowers active cooldowns!
name: Destructive Abacus

effect: Increases potency of your poison status effects!
name: Devi's Bug Spray

effect: Adds a small chance of dealing massive damage with your critical hits!
name: Dice of the Nemesis

effect: Increase basic arcana damage! All other damage decreased.
name: Double Edged Cestus

effect: Reduces cooldowns by half but receive double damage!
name: Double Toil

effect: Deal double damage but receive double damage!
name: Double Trouble

effect: Increases fire and lightning arcana damage, but receive more damage from water and earth attacks!
name: Ebon Wolf's Cloak

effect: Using a dash arcana immediately after another arcana lowers cooldowns for all arcana of the same element as your dash!
name: Elemental Pointes

effect: Remaining motionless for a short time causes you to disappear from sight!
name: Elven Ears

effect: Designed by Artisan Tacobowl8, this relic allows you to look quite dashing as you gallop to max speed with ease!
name: Equestricap

effect: Increases armor!
name: Euphie's Shawl

effect: Basic arcana chains are completed automatically!
name: Evening Gloves

effect: Allows you to destroy enemy projectiles with melee basic arcana!
name: Flak Gauntlet

effect: Allows you to triple dash but lowers movement speed!
name: Flashy Boots

effect: Randomly empowers an arcana at the beginning of each stage!
name: Fortune Cookie

effect: Summons a sprite that freezes enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.
name: Freezing Sprite Naya

effect: Increase damage and movement speed when you're with a true friend!
name: Friendship Bracelet

effect: Prevents freeze status effect!
name: Fuzzy Handwarmers

effect: Increases earth damage!
name: Gaia's Shovel

effect: Increases max health!
name: Giant's Heart

effect: Damage increased but max health is reduced!
name: Glass Cannon

effect: Increase gold gain for all wizards! Multiple gloves do not stack.
name: Glove of Midas

effect: Increases armor but store prices are increased!
name: Golden Armor of Envy

effect: Increases damage but store prices are increased!
name: Golden Saber of Envy

effect: Increases the distances traveled by dash arcana!
name: Greased Boots

effect: Increases the damage of summoned agents!
name: Grimoire of Ruin

effect: Prevents poison status effect!
name: Gummy Vitamins

effect: Receive a discount whenever you purchase potions from the merchant!
name: Health Care Card

effect: Increases armor for each relic held!
name: Heavy Travel Jacket

effect: Revive with low health when defeated but consumes half of current health when picked up! This relic is destroyed on use.
name: Horned Halo

effect: Briefly hover over pits!
name: Hummingbird Feather

effect: Increase damage against foes that are inflicted with a status ailment.
name: Hunter's Stiletto

effect: Signature charges faster at low health!
name: Hyperbolic Train

effect: All arcana are empowered when at full health!
name: Idealist's Mirror

effect: Increases fire damage!
name: Ifrit's Matchstick

effect: Summons a sprite that burns enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.
name: Igniting Sprite Vesa

effect: Increases duration of your shock status effects!
name: Indra's Copper Pipe

effect: Signature charge stays active until used!
name: Infinity Marble

effect: A crest presented only to those who have cleared the Chaos Trials!
name: Insignia of Legend

effect: Picking up chaos gems heals for a small amount. Excludes gems collected from Council members.
name: Jewelry Box

effect: Gain gold when defeating consecutive enemies without taking damage!
name: Journal of Midas

effect: When taking damage that would defeat you, gain full signature charge and briefly become immune to defeat!
name: Kali's Flower Diadem

effect: Regain full health every time an exit portal is used! Max health is reduced and health potions have no effect.
name: Large Red Button

effect: Evade all attacks while dashing!
name: Leemo's Leaf

effect: Release a burst of lightning when taking damage!
name: Lei's Drum

effect: Reduces damage taken to a maximum of 10% of max health!
name: Limited Edition Robe

effect: Summons an aura that freezes nearby enemies.
name: Lotus Froststone

effect: Memorizes the last three attacks taken and reduces damage from attacks of the same type!
name: Memory Chainmail

effect: Increase damage based on number of relics in inventory.
name: Merchant's Cart

effect: Increases movement speed!
name: Mercury's Sandals

effect: Increases healing received from all sources!
name: Messy Prescription

effect: Summons a shield that reflects one projectile!
name: Mirror Shield

effect: A ticket to Lanova Museum's newly opened Chaos Trials exhibit!
name: Museum Ticket

effect: Increases knockback when striking foes!
name: Mystic Monopole

effect: Adds a chance to slow foes!
name: Nerite Shell

effect: Holding seven lightning arcana increases critical chance! All arcana shocks foes!
name: Neve's Citrine

effect: Holding seven earth arcana increase health and armor and lowers stun and knockback!
name: Neve's Emerald

effect: Holding seven air arcana increases movement speed and evasion. All arcana slows foes!
name: Neve's Quartz

effect: Holding seven fire arcana increases damage! All arcana burns foes!
name: Neve's Ruby

effect: Holding seven water arcana reduces all cooldowns and increases healing!
name: Neve's Sapphire

effect: Adds a chance that an arcana will not go on cooldown after use!
name: Nocturnal Sundial

effect: Adds a significant chance to evade attacks but take double damage!
name: Nog's Heavenly Boots

effect: Adds a chance to poison foes!
name: Noxious Dappercap

effect: Immediately receive a large sum of gold! All gold gained, with interest, will go toward paying off this debt.
name: Ominous Loan Note

effect: Expend all gold at the start of each stage and heal for a fraction of the expended amount.
name: Overpriced Insurance

effect: Your attacks on council members are more pun-ishing! Enemy attacks pack an extra pun-ch.
name: Paronomasicon

effect: On clearing the floor, receive a heal based on the map reveal percentage.
name: Pathfinder's Knapsack

effect: Reveals the layout and main points of interest of the Chaos Trials!
name: Pathfinder's Map

effect: Revive with low health when defeated! Hat can also create health orbs when dropped. This relic is destroyed on use.
name: Pazu's Favorite Hat

effect: Signature damage, charge rate, and decay rate increased!
name: Perfect Time Crystal

effect: Adds a chance to freeze foes!
name: Permafrost Cube

effect: Adds a chance to burn foes!
name: Phoenix Talon

effect: Designed by Artisan PerdyDarnSavvy, this relic activates when taking damage at low health and briefly removes the cooldown on all arcana!
name: Phyyrnx's Hourglass

effect: Summons a sprite that poisons enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.
name: Plaguing Sprite Dria

effect: Increases fire and ice damage! Adds a chance to freeze and burn foes to fire and ice arcana, respectively.
name: Poem of Fiery Rime

effect: Increases the number of summoned agents, but lowers their health!
name: Pop-up Primer

effect: Evade all critical hits!
name: Puffy Parka

effect: Adds a chance that an item purchased in the Chaos Trials will be free of charge.
name: Raffle Ticket

effect: Health orbs drop more frequently!
name: Raspberry Cookie Box

effect: Releases a grove of rooting vines when taking damage!
name: Reactive Vinemail

effect: Using a fully charged signature arcana heals you instead of producing a signature spell!
name: Regenerative Inkwell

effect: Your projectiles destroy any other projectiles they strike!
name: Reinforced Bracers

effect: All gold costs for relics are discounted!
name: Relic Rewards Card

effect: Regain a small amount of health when teleporting to the next area!
name: Renewing Potion Vial

effect: Increases resistance to fire based attacks!
name: Resolute Svalinn

effect: Gain a shield every time a charged signature is not activated and times out.
name: Ring of Recycling

effect: Adds more uses to all multi-use arcana!
name: Ring of Reserves

effect: Reduces all cooldowns!
name: Roxel's Pendulum

effect: Equipping arcana of the same element increases damage!
name: Royal Flush

effect: Increases air damage!
name: Rudra's Pinwheel

effect: You can no longer be interrupted while casting an arcana!
name: Sano's Headband

effect: Sacrifice all standard arcana in your hand to revive from defeat!
name: Scissors of Vitality

effect: Your signature will take longer to charge, but can now be used twice on a single charge!
name: Secret Wild Card

effect: Increases damage but signature can no longer be charged!
name: Sharpened Stylus

effect: Increases water damage!
name: Shiva's Water Bottle

effect: All melee basic arcana have a secondary hit that deals reduced damage!
name: Sidewinder's Badge

effect: Increases the activation speed of arcana but slows movement speed!
name: Silver Spinning Top

effect: Not using arcana for a short period of time causes your next spell to be a critical hit!
name: Singing Bowl

effect: Designed by Artisan Steven Wu, this relic increases all damage for every enemy defeated, but loses effectiveness when taking damage.
name: Sinister Ledger

effect: Summons an aura that calls down lightning on nearby enemies.
name: Sleepy Thunderstone

effect: Summons a sprite that shocks enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.
name: Sparking Sprite Etra

effect: Defeated enemies have a chance to explode and freeze nearby enemies!
name: Special Snowflake

effect: Increase movement speed everytime an arcana is used! Speed is increased for each arcana on cooldown!
name: Spell Thief's Socks

effect: Using an arcana of a different element reduces the cooldown of the previously used arcana.
name: Spice Rack

effect: Regenerate health while at critically low health! Max health is reduced.
name: Spiked Emergency Kit

effect: All fire arcana cause burning but take double damage from water spells! Second half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.
name: Stanza of Flames

effect: Increases ice damage! First half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.
name: Stanza of Frost

effect: Briefly become invulnerable after taking damage in quick succession!
name: Stygian Turtle Shell

effect: Taking damage increases your max health up to a certain limit!
name: Super Carrot Cake

effect: Prevents burn status effect!
name: Super Sunscreen

effect: The relic and arcana stores will instantly restock after purchase! Health potions are of short supply and will not be restocked.
name: Supply Crate

effect: Signature charge no longer decays while building up!
name: Surefire Rocket

effect: When healed for more than your maximum health, gain a shield equal to half of the excess heal amount.
name: Takeout Box

effect: Following up a basic arcana with another arcana increases its critical hit chance!
name: Tapping Gloves

effect: All heals increase your max health up to a certain limit!
name: Tea of Mercy

effect: Gain gold when taking damage!
name: Tears of Midas

effect: Adds a chance to shock foes!
name: Tesla Coil

effect: Every point of damage taken adds a page to this thesis. Every 200 pages reduces all damage taken by 1. (Maximum 1000 pages)
name: Thesis on Defense

effect: Increases resistance to water based attacks!
name: Three Gorges Bulwark

effect: Reduces max health but increases max health for each enemy defeated!
name: Tiny Crocodile Heart

effect: Increase armor but decrease damage!
name: Tortoise Shield

effect: Designed by Artisan Curt 'Tozy' Toczydlowski, this relic reduces cooldowns but also reduces signature charge rate!
name: Tozy's Pocket Watch

effect: Arcana of matching elements increases resistance to that element! Requires two or more arcana of the same element.
name: Tracking Suit

effect: Rainbows!
name: Unicorn Tail

effect: Regenerate health every time you land a critical hit!
name: Vampire's Eyeglasses

effect: Defeating enemies regenerates health but max health is reduced!
name: Vampire's Fangs

effect: Signature charge rate and decay are increased dramatically but charged signature damage is reduced! Shell of the Perfect Time Crystal.
name: Volatile Gemstone

effect: Enables you to purchase items with health when you don't have sufficient gold.
name: Wallet of Vigor

effect: Increases the damage of your signature arcana! Core of the Perfect Time Crystal.
name: Wanderer's Mechanism

effect: Adds a chance that enemies will explode when defeated!
name: Whimsical Explodium

effect: Increases the duration of summoned agents!
name: Yuna's Storybook
